# Evaluation of sPLS-DA model

Leave-one-out cross-validation was used to examine the performance of the sPLS-DA model based on diet vs. no-diet. 

 Overall Error rate : `r diet.perf.splsda.loo$error.rate$overall[1,1]`
 AUC: `r auc_save[1]`
